commitResults.messageBody:
The naming of several variables & methods were not in line with the code
quality standard. These were fixed for better readability &
understanding by other devs.

There were also missing javadocs, wrong placements of import statements
that were flagged by the checkstyle.

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement basic functionality of reminders.
commitResults.messageBody:
The reminder functionality is achieved by showing an Alert dialog. The
Alert dialog will contain details of the task. The reminder is triggered
when the dates associated with tasks are within 1 day from the time the
application is launched.

commitResults.messageTitle: Reminder implementation with Thread
commitResults.messageBody:
In this implementation of the Reminder feature, we use a Thread to
cyclically call the lazy function executing the Information alert
dialog popup.

commitResults.messageTitle: Reminder implementation with Timer only, no Thread.
commitResults.messageBody:
In this implementation of the Reminder feature, the previous
implementation involving the use of Threads was scrapped as the
occurrence of the Thread in line with its sleep rate caused problematic
behavior.

Hence, in this implementation, the start & stop of the Reminder feature
is controlly only via Timer, with the schedule() & cancel() methods.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor Task, Deadline, Event & TaskList.
commitResults.messageBody:
We refactor Task, Deadline & Event so that Task has a LocalDate as one
of its variables so that calling getDate() can be applied to Task.

TaskList is also refactored so that the ArrayList containing the tasks
is a static object. After all, there will only be one instance of the
TaskList in the entire runtime of the application.

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement RemindersTask & ReminderPredicates for Reminder feature.
commitResults.messageBody:
We implement RemindersTask as an explicit class to store all
functionalities associated with triggering the Reminder function,
building of Reminder alert dialog.

The ReminderPredicates class is implemented to store various Predicates
relating to different types of Reminders that can be set.

Refactor GUI for an improve UI.
commitResults.messageBody:
The MainWindow was set to a fixed size & it won't be resizable.

The overall UI of the chatbot was improved, with the use of additional
styling & color.
